|brand = Banana Pi |model = BPI R |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 64 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/21/2019 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Banana_Pi_BPI_R64 |wlclass = N600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer, wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7622A; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.35 GHz<!-- 1.35 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = MediaTek;MT7531BE; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, SATA, MicroSD Card slot, SIM Card slot |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_sata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MicroSD Card slot, SIM Card slot, Bluetooth 5.0, ZigBee, PoE |addchip = PMIC;MediaTek;MT6380;;1; ,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SinoVoIP |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/11/2020 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B08F2DW9J9 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = 6.3 x 4.33 x 0.79 inches |weight = 7.1 ounces
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== :;Banana Pi RPI R64 board *SoC: [[MediaTek]] MT7622A @1.35GHz :Dual-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) *System Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Storage: 8GB (eMMC) flash (option 16/32/64G) :MicroSD slot (up to 256GB); 1x SATA interface *Network: 5x 10/100/1000Mbps Ethernet ports *Connectivity: USB: 1x USB 3.0 port :1x GbE WAN; 4x GbE LAN ports ([[MediaTek]] MT7531BE) *WLAN: 802.11bgn 4×4, BT 5.0 ([[MediaTek]] MT7622A) *Optional: 4G module (Mini PCIe) + SIM Card slot *Expansion: 40-pin GPIO header *Misc: Reset button, 3-pin header for serial console *Power Supply: 12V/2A DC power (barrel) jack :Optional PoE module with support for 12V/3A
==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Banana_Pi ''Banana Pi'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[http://wiki.banana-pi.org/Banana_Pi_BPI-R64 ''Banana Pi BPI-R64'' on '''Banana Pi''' Wiki]
===News=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/06/01/MediaTek-mt7622-soc-with-wifi-network-accelerator-supports-4x4-802-11n-wifi-bluetooth-5/ ''MediaTek MT7622 SoC with 4×4 802.11n WiFi & BT 5.0'' on '''CNX-Software'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/07/27/banana-pi-bpi-r64-router-board-is-powered-by-MediaTek-mt7622-supports-802-11ac-wifi-poe/ ''Banana Pi BPI-R64 Board is Powered by MediaTek MT7622'' on '''CNX-Software''']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/sinovoip/sinovoip_bananapi_bpi-r64_v1.1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/sinovoip/bananapi_bpi-r64_v1.1 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = mediatek |subtarget = mt7622 |arch = aarch64_cortex-a53 |support_started_version = 22.03.0 |current_supported_version = 22.03.0 |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = V1.0 & V1.1 devices limited to mPCIe cards that draw <2.5A at 3.3v. V1.2 devices can use mPCIe cards that draw up to 3.5a at 3.3v }} Please insert instructions here
